footer-desc: ECOKA LTD. CO. is a company that produces and trades traditional handicraft products from 100% natural materials such as: water hyacinth, rattan, bamboo and macrame.
about-02: A company that produces and trades traditional handicraft products from 100% natural materials such as: water hyacinth, rattan, bamboo, and macrame.
about-04: Ecoka was formerly a craft production facility with more than 4 years of experience since 2018 in producing environmentally friendly handicrafts from natural materials available in the region. Western Vietnam: water hyacinth, sedge, rattan, bamboo... for international customers: USA, UK, France..
about-05: With a team of skilled craftsmen, carefully trained in product quality requirements, Ecoka ensures to bring finished products that are diverse in design and sophisticated in each design with international quality.
about-06: Coming to Ecoka, you will definitely be satisfied with the professional service style, guaranteed product quality and reasonable prices
about-08: Becoming an international Vietnamese Brand in the field of manufacturing and exporting quality goods with environmentally friendly materials.
about-09: Not only bringing good things to customers, Ecoka also wants to create many job opportunities for poor people in the West and provide career orientation for young people, focusing on environmental protection. The school is the center of business.
about-10: Ecoka's mission is to bring quality products that are safe for health and the environment, changing the plastic product consumption habits of many people, the main purpose of which is to bring Vietnamese products to replace wings in the international market.
about-12: Becoming a leading symbol of trust in the quality of environmentally friendly consumer products for both Vietnamese and international markets.
